messages.content: Thank you for calling Nestlé customer service. My name is Adam. May I know your name, please?
Hi Michael, thank you for reaching out. How can I assist you today?
I'm really upset. I bought a Nespresso Coffee Machine, and it arrived damaged. This is unacceptable!
I'm really sorry to hear that, Michael. Could you please describe the damage to the Nespresso Coffee Machine?
The machine has a big dent on the side, and it doesn't even turn on. I can't believe this passed quality control.

I apologize for the inconvenience, Michael. We take issues like this very seriously. I assure you we will resolve this as quickly as possible. Could you provide me with the serial number of the machine?
The serial number is 98765XYZ. Can you just get this sorted out?

Thank you for the information, Michael. I'll initiate the process for a replacement immediately. Our support team will contact you shortly to arrange the next steps. You should receive an email within the next 24 hours.
I hope so. This has already taken too much of my time.
I understand your frustration, Michael. We're here to make sure this is resolved promptly. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, just get it done fast.
Absolutely, Michael. We'll make sure this is handled quickly. Thank you for your patience.
